remove_tray.description: Slide out the oven tray from the oven.

insert_tray.description: Slide in the oven tray into the oven.

close_door.description: Close the oven's door by swinging it to the closed position.

open_door.description: Open the oven's door by swinging it to open position.

clean_oven_body.description: Clean the oven body to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_oven_door.description: Clean the oven door to ensure clear visibility.

clean_tray.description: Clean the oven tray to remove any food particles.

cleanup_oven.description: Clean the entire oven including the oven body, oven door, and oven tray.
